title: randomSampling does not exist
body:
Hi, I am trying to install nucChIP and got this message when running the python build command:

```
 python setup.py build
running build
running build_py
running build_scripts
error: file '/home/avilella/nucChIP/bin/randomSampling' does not exist
```

Any ideas?

title: MNase-like data
body: Is this a good software to use for MNase-like (in general ChIP-seq like) datasets that would give me a per-position score combining read depth + insert size + nucleosome positioning information? Thx.
